items.title: Here are 5 mounting risks that could hurt the S&P 500, according to BofA
items.description: Valuations are high, bear-market signposts are piling up, and companies are now contending with both tariff uncertainty and a data blackout.

items.title: Netflix shares fall after company reports profit miss
items.description: The company’s earnings came in below expectations, with the stage set for big gains with the company’s ad business in the fourth quarter.

items.title: ‘A friend calls it the everything bubble’: Why do so many economists fear a 1929-style crash?
items.description: We have faced fears, for more than 10 years, that the market is going to experience the kind of crash not seen in nearly a century.
